text: @BillGates @imv_inc hey Bill, appreciate all you have done with advanced warnings and offering grant money to possible COVID-19 cures!! Take a look at this Canadian biotech, any chance you can help accelerate their COVID-Cure approach? The more cures the merrier 😀😀😀
